select price,date,stockCode,stockName,stockNum,stockPer,dataUrl from (
select t.stock_up,t.stock_price price,t.postion_date date,t.stock_code stockCode,t.stock_name stockName,t.stock_num stockNum,t.stock_per stockPer,l.data_url dataUrl, lead(stock_per,0)over(partition by stock_code order by postion_date desc) one, lead(stock_per,1)over(partition by stock_code order by postion_date desc) yesterday, lead(stock_per,7)over(partition by stock_code order by postion_date desc) seven, lead(stock_per,15)over(partition by stock_code order by postion_date desc) fiveteen, row_number()over(partition by stock_code order by postion_date desc) rn
from hk_postion_detail t left join hk_position_list l on t.stock_code = l.data_code
)a where a.rn=1 and one-yesterday>0.2 and one-fiveteen>1.5 and one >3 and one < 15
